// Code generated by clipper. DO NOT EDIT.
package cmd

import (
	"os"

	"github.com/spf13/cobra"
)

var appCmd *cobra.Command

type Service interface {
	App(cmd *cobra.Command, args []string)
	Config(cmd *cobra.Command, args []string)
	ConfigCreate(cmd *cobra.Command, args []string)
	Fetch(cmd *cobra.Command, args []string)
}

func NewAppCmd(svc Service) *cobra.Command {
    appCmd = &cobra.Command{
    	Use:   "app",
    	Short: "app short description",
    	Long:  `app long description`,
    }
    return appCmd
}

func Execute(svc Service) {
	NewAppCmd(svc)
	addCommands(svc)
	err := appCmd.Execute()
	if err != nil {
		os.Exit(1)
	}
}

func addCommands(svc Service) {
	appCmd.AddCommand(NewConfigCmd(svc))
	appCmd.AddCommand(NewFetchCmd(svc))
	configCmd.AddCommand(NewConfigCreateCmd(svc))
}
